usage: Used for strength training, resistance workouts, and fitness exercises at home, in classes, or in a gym workout area.
key_features: Dumbbell hand weights for exercise and resistance training
Ideal for fitness classes, home gym, or workout area
Cast iron construction with neoprene coating for durability and safety
Printed weight number on each end cap
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
ai_description: A pair of compact pink hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth neoprene-coated surface and printed weight markings on the end caps. The solid, fixed-weight design and flat sides keep them stable on the floor, while the matte coating suggests a secure, comfortable hand grip.
target_audience: Home exercisers, fitness enthusiasts, and people attending workout or fitness classes who need fixed-weight dumbbells.
product_name: KAKSS Neoprene Workout Fixed Weight Dumbbell (5-Pound, Set Of 2pc)
